repairedDockerfile:
FROM ndslabs/cloud9-base:3.0 

#USER root 
#RUN useradd developer -c "NodeJS Developer" 
# Install NodeJS / NPM 
RUN apt-get -qq update && \
 apt-get -qq -y --no-install-recommends install npm && \
ln -s /usr/bin/nodejs /usr/bin/node && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

# Install Bower / Grunt / Gulp 
RUN npm install -g bower grunt gulp && npm cache clean --force;

#USER developer
